<h2>In-Class Exercise: RquetteBB</h2>

As a final exercise, we're going to talk through the process of creating an R package from scratch! In this class, we're going to create a package called `RquetteBB` for getting and visualizing Marquette Men's basketball statistics!

Given the complexity of this exercise, slides are really not an appropriate medium. Head over to the [Week 5 Programming Supplement](https://jameslamb.github.io/teaching/mu_rprog/code/Week5_Supplement.html)
